title: The Masked Singer Australia's Dragon is revealed
text:
The identity of the Masked Singer Australia's The Dragon has been revealed.

On Tuesday night, the costumed contestant was revealed to be Australian country singer Adam Brand, 49.

Despite the other judges being way off, it was singer Dannii Minogue who correctly guessed the mystery star during the episode.

Mystery no more! The Masked Singer Australia's Dragon was unmasked on Tuesday night's episode, with it being revealed to be country singer Adam Brand, 49

Lindsay Lohan guessed Keith Urban, Jackie 'O' Henderson guessed Shannon Noll, while Dave Hughes thought it was Lee Kernaghan.

The clues for the singer included that he was a 'western dragon', adding he is built for speed and possessing artistic balance.

In other clues the Italian flag flashed up along with him cooking in the kitchen, and the Dragon went on to say his personal drought broke in 2008.

Wowzers! Explaining the clues after he was unmasked, Adam (L) explained his heritage is Italian and that he was born Adamo Alberto Brun. Here with host Osher Günsberg

Explaining the clues after he was unmasked, Adam explained his heritage is Italian and that he was born Adamo Alberto Brun.

He went on to say a number of the race car clues were related to him being involved in the brute utes with TV star Grant Denyer.

Adam said it was his daughter who inspired him to do the show.

'If there was one main reason why I did this show, it's a few years down the track, maybe three or four years down the track.

Experience: 'My little girl's in the lounge room and she's talking to one of her friends, and she's saying, "My daddy's a singing dragon",' Adam said of the reason why he did the show

'My little girl's in the lounge room and she's talking to one of her friends, and she's saying, "My daddy's a singing dragon",' he said.

'One day, my little girl is going to be proud that her daddy was the singing dragon.'

Despite the guesses usually being way off, a number of Twitter users managed to guess the Golden Guitar winning artist.

Correct: Judge Dannii Minogue (pictured) guessed correctly, with her able to decipher the Dragon's clues

'Ohhh this is awesome Adam Brand,' one wrote.

Another added: 'Adam Brand's Wikipedia page just got a few thousand hits from people trying to figure out who he is.'

Another snarky fan wrote: 'I feel like Lindsay right now.'

Adam joins other unmasked celebrities including Nikki Webster, Darren McMullen and former cricketer Brett Lee.

The Masked Singer continues on Monday on Channel 10 from 7.30pm
description: The identity of the Masked Singer Australia's The Dragon has been revealed.
authors: Caleb Taylor For Daily Mail Australia
